blocks.name: cmade
blocks.content: Declare the symbol for the made by function.

blocks.name: cold
blocks.content: Declare the symbol for the older than function.

blocks.name: cnew
blocks.content: Declare the symbol for the new on function.

blocks.name: cleft
blocks.content: Declare the symbol for the left option function.

blocks.name: cright
blocks.content: Declare the symbol for the right option function.

blocks.name: df-made
blocks.content: Define the made by function. This function carries an ordinal to all surreals made by sections of surreals older than it. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: df-old
blocks.content: Define the older than function. This function carries an ordinal to all surreals made by a previous ordinal. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: df-new
blocks.content: Define the newer than function. This function carries an ordinal to all surreals made on that day. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: df-left
blocks.content: Define the left options of a surreal. This is the set of surreals that are "closest" on the left to the given surreal. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: df-right
blocks.content: Define the left options of a surreal. This is the set of surreals that are "closest" on the right to the given surreal. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: madeval
blocks.content: The value of the made by function. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm madeval(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(cfv(cmade, c0), cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))))))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cmade, c0), cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))))))), cres(cmade, c0)), wcel(c0, con0))
  tfr2(c0, cmade, cmpt(hs0, universe, cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))))))))
  fvmptd3(hs0, cmpt(hs0, universe, cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))))))), cres(cmade, c0), cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))))), universe, cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))))), universe, wcel(c0, con0))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, universe, cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))))))))
  imaeq2d(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))))), cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cres(cmade, c0)))
  sqxpeqd(cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cres(cmade, c0)))
  pweqd(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cuni(cima(cmade, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cres(cmade, c0)))
  unieqd(crn(cv(hs0)), cima(cmade, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cres(cmade, c0)))
  syl6eqr(crn(cv(hs0)), cima(cmade, c0), crn(cres(cmade, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cres(cmade, c0)))
  rneq(cv(hs0), cres(cmade, c0))
  df-ima(cmade, c0)
  mpan(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cres(cmade, c0), universe), wfun(cmade))
  resfunexg(cmade, c0, con0)
  sylancr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))))), universe), wfun(cscut), wcel(cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), universe))
  ax-mp(wfun(cscut), wf(cscut, csslt, csur))
  scutf()
  ffun(cscut, csslt, csur)
  xpexd(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), universe, universe, wcel(c0, con0))
  3syl(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), universe), wcel(cima(cmade, c0), universe), wcel(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)), universe))
  mpan(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cima(cmade, c0), universe), wfun(cmade))
  ax-mp(wfun(cmade), wfn(cmade, con0))
  tfr1(cmade, cmpt(hs0, universe, cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))))))))
  df-made(hs0)
  fnfun(cmade, con0)
  funimaexg(cmade, c0, con0)
  uniexg(cima(cmade, c0), universe)
  pwexg(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)), universe)
  funimaexg(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(cmade, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))))))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm madeval(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà On ‚Üí(_M ` c0)=(|s "(P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0))√ó P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0)))))
} = {
  eqtrd((_M ` c0), (|s "(P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0))√ó P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0)))), ((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(|s "(P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0))√ó P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0)))))`(_M |` c0)), c0 ‚àà On)
  tfr2(c0, cmade, (hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(|s "(P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0))√ó P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0))))))
  fvmptd3(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(|s "(P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0))√ó P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0))))), (_M |` c0), (|s "(P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0))√ó P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0)))), universe, (|s "(P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0))√ó P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0)))), universe, c0 ‚àà On)
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(|s "(P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0))√ó P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0))))))
  imaeq2d(cscut, (P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0))√ó P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0))), (P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0))√ó P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0))), hs0 =(_M |` c0))
  sqxpeqd(P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0)), P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0)), hs0 =(_M |` c0))
  pweqd(‚ãÉ ran(hs0), ‚ãÉ(_M " c0), hs0 =(_M |` c0))
  unieqd(ran(hs0), (_M " c0), hs0 =(_M |` c0))
  syl6eqr(ran(hs0), (_M " c0), ran((_M |` c0)), hs0 =(_M |` c0))
  rneq(hs0, (_M |` c0))
  df-ima(cmade, c0)
  mpan(c0 ‚àà On, (_M |` c0)‚àà ùïå, Fun(_M))
  resfunexg(cmade, c0, con0)
  sylancr(c0 ‚àà On, (|s "(P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0))√ó P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0))))‚àà ùïå, Fun(|s), (P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0))√ó P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0)))‚àà ùïå)
  ax-mp(Fun(|s), (|s : <<s ‚Üí No))
  scutf()
  ffun(cscut, csslt, csur)
  xpexd(P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0)), P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0)), universe, universe, c0 ‚àà On)
  3syl(c0 ‚àà On, P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0))‚àà ùïå, (_M " c0)‚àà ùïå, ‚ãÉ(_M " c0)‚àà ùïå)
  mpan(c0 ‚àà On, (_M " c0)‚àà ùïå, Fun(_M))
  ax-mp(Fun(_M), _M[Fn]On)
  tfr1(cmade, (hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(|s "(P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0))√ó P(‚ãÉ ran(hs0))))))
  df-made(hs0)
  fnfun(cmade, con0)
  funimaexg(cmade, c0, con0)
  uniexg((_M " c0), universe)
  pwexg(‚ãÉ(_M " c0), universe)
  funimaexg(cscut, (P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0))√ó P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0))), universe)
  diff.hs0.c((_M |` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((|s "(P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0))√ó P(‚ãÉ(_M " c0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
}

blocks.name: madeval2
blocks.content: Alternative characterization of the made by function. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm madeval2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(cfv(cmade, c0), crab(s0, csur, wrex(s1, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wrex(s2, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), csslt, cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  syl6eq(cfv(cmade, c0), crab(s0, csur, wrex(s1, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wrex(s2, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), csslt, cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))), cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))))), wcel(c0, con0))

  abbii(s0, wrex(s1, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wrex(s2, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), csslt, cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), csur), wrex(s1, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wrex(s2, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), csslt, cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))))
  pm4.71ri(wrex(s1, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wrex(s2, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), csslt, cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s0), csur))
  rexlimivw(s1, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wrex(s2, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), csslt, cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), csur))
  rexlimivw(s2, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), csslt, cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), csur))
  mpan9(wbr(cv(s1), csslt, cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), csur), wcel(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), csur))
  simp1d(wbr(cv(s1), csslt, cv(s2)), wcel(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), csur), wbr(cv(s1), csslt, csn(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)))), wbr(csn(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2))), csslt, cv(s2)))
  scutcut(cv(s1), cv(s2))

  eleq1(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), cv(s0), csur)
  abbi2i(s0, cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))))), wrex(s1, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wrex(s2, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), csslt, cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(s0), cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))))), wrex(s1, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wrex(s2, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), csslt, cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), cv(s0))))), wrex(hs0, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csslt), wbr(cv(hs0), cscut, cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wrex(s2, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wa(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), csslt), wbr(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cscut, cv(s0))))))

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wcel(cv(hs0), csslt), wbr(cv(hs0), cscut, cv(s0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), csslt), wbr(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cscut, cv(s0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), csslt)
  breq1(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cscut, cv(s0))
  3bitri(wcel(cv(s0), cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))))), wrex(hs0, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csslt), wbr(cv(hs0), cscut, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cima(cscut, cin(cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), csslt))), wrex(hs0, cin(cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), csslt), wbr(cv(hs0), cscut, cv(s0))))
  eleq2i(cv(s0), cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))))), cima(cscut, cin(cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), csslt)))
  eqtri(cima(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))))), cima(cscut, cin(cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), csslt)), cima(cscut, cin(cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), cdm(cscut))))
  imaindm(cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))))
  imaeq2i(cscut, cin(cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), cdm(cscut)), cin(cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), csslt))
  ineq2i(cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), cdm(cscut), csslt)
  dmscut()
  elima(hs0, cv(s0), cscut, cin(cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), csslt))
  vex(s0)
  rexbii2(hs0, cin(cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), csslt), cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cscut, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csslt), wbr(cv(hs0), cscut, cv(s0))))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), csslt)), wbr(cv(hs0), cscut, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csslt), wbr(cv(hs0), cscut, cv(s0)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), csslt)), wbr(cv(hs0), cscut, cv(s0))))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))), csslt)), wbr(cv(hs0), cscut, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), csslt)))

  2rexbii(s1, s2, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), csslt, cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), csslt), wbr(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cscut, cv(s0))))

  fnbrfvb(cscut, csslt, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0))
  df-rab(s0, csur, wrex(s1, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wrex(s2, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), csslt, cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cscut, cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))

  diff.csur.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), csur)
  diff.csur.s(s2)
  diff.cima.s(s0, cscut, cxp(cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))))
  diff.cscut.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))), cpw(cuni(cima(cmade, c0))))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cuni(cima(cmade, c0)))

  diff.cima.s(s1, cmade, c0)
